name: Startup India Registration
shortDescription: Start-up is a company or project undertaken by an entrepreneur to seek and develop a scalable business.
description: Start-up is a company or project undertaken by an entrepreneur to seek and develop a scalable business. An entity shall be considered as a Startup if a period of ten years from the date of incorporation/ registration, if it is incorporated as a private limited company (as defined in the Companies Act, 2013) or registered as a partnership firm (registered under section 59 of the Partnership Act, 1932) or a limited liability partnership (under the Limited Liability Partnership Act, 2008) in India. Turnover of the entity for any of the financial years since incorporation/ registration has not exceeded one hundred crore rupees.

node.name: GST Registration
node.shortDescription: Goods and Services Tax is an indirect tax used in India on the supply of goods and service.

node.name: MSME (Udyam) Registration
node.shortDescription: The Government of India has introduced MSME or Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises in agreement with Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises Development (MSMED) Act of 2006.

node.name: Trademark Registration
node.shortDescription: A trademark or service mark is a word, name, symbol, or device used to indicate the source, quality and ownership of a product or service.

howWeWork.heading: How to get Startup India registration

content.title: Select Registration Product
content.description: Choose your required Registration and Add-Ons to get maximum discount

content.title: Upload Documents
content.description: Upload all the required Documents and schedule Call with the Lawyer

content.title: File Application
content.description: Lawyer will file your Application and pay the required Government fees

content.title: Get Registration Certificate
content.description: Lawyer will Follow-up and Respond to any objections raised and get your Registration Certificate

content.title: Tax Exemptions
content.description: A registered startup can avail of an exemption from payment of income tax for three consecutive years out of the first 10 years from the date of its incorporation. It provides exemption under Section 80-IAC.

content.title: Registration of Intellectual Property
content.description: A startup registered and recognized by DPIIT gets concession on IP registrations.

content.title: Legal Protection
content.description: It protects the rights of the owner and the original works. It protects the original work against piracy. It prevents losses arising from copies being made of the original work. It safeguards patents.

content.title: Research and Development Opportunity
content.description: A registered and recognized startup gets access to funding under different schemes providing more Research and Development opportunity.

content.description: A recommendation letter from an Incubator
A recommendation later by the Central or any State Government of India
A patent filed and published in the Journal of Indian Patent office

faqs.question: What is a Tech Startup?
faqs.answer: A Tech Startup is a startup that is focused on technology-based products or services.

faqs.question: What is Venture Capital?
faqs.answer: Venture Capital is a type of private equity with good potential for growth can receive funding. There are different types of venture capitals.

faqs.question: How long would recognition as a “Startup” be valid?
faqs.answer: An entity shall cease to be a Startup on completion of ten years from the date of its incorporation/ registration.

faqs.question: If I have questions regarding my documents or the process, how can I ask?
faqs.answer: Once you purchase any product from the ezyLegal website, you will be credited minutes in your account. You can use these minutes to connect with the Lawyer and ask questions and take guidance from the Expert.

faqs.question: How to register a startup in India?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal can help you get your startup registered and provide you with the right legal guidance. You can schedule your Consultation with an ezyLegal Lawyer and know the detailed process and advantages of registering a startup.

faqs.question: How will I know the status of the registration process?
faqs.answer: Status updates will be available on the ezyLegal website (www.ezylegal.in) in your secured Account. Additionally, you will be notified on email and WhatsApp.
